body.p:
WaveStar Infinity components consist of the WaveStar Infinity 7" color touchscreen and a set of sensor boards customized for the underlying PDU power distribution configuration. The PowerHub 2 Monitoring Compartment () has these WaveStar Infinity components:
WaveStar Infinity 7" Color Touchscreen Monitor on the front of the compartment door
VVIT (Voltage-Voltage-Current-Transformer) Sensor Base Board
Sensor Combo Boards with Option Boards
Sensors for monitoring subfeeds are located outside the compartment:
Sensor Combo 8xI board for subfeed CTs is with high-power components.
All PDUs with WaveStar Infinity have at minimum a WaveStar Infinity 7" Monitor and a Sensor Base Board.
PowerHub 2 Monitoring Compartment with WaveStar Infinity PCBs
